title: QC Basic Statistics
description: Summary statistics calculated by FASTQC for subset samples, concatenated across samples within a group by the DOWNSTREAM workflow. Each row represents one sample's summary statistics.

fields.name: n_reads_single
fields.title: Single-End Read Count
fields.description: Number of single-end reads. For paired-end data, this equals the number of read pairs multiplied by 2.

fields.name: n_read_pairs
fields.title: Read Pair Count
fields.description: Number of read pairs. For single-end data (e.g. ONT), this is NA.

fields.name: percent_duplicates
fields.title: Percent Duplicates
fields.description: Mean percentage of duplicate sequences across read files, as estimated by FASTQC's duplication analysis.

fields.name: n_bases_approx
fields.title: Approximate Base Count
fields.description: Approximate total number of sequenced bases across all reads in the sample, as reported by FASTQC (roughly n_reads_single Ã— mean_seq_len).

fields.name: per_base_sequence_quality
fields.title: Per Base Sequence Quality
fields.description: FASTQC pass/warn/fail result for per-base sequence quality.

fields.name: per_sequence_quality_scores
fields.title: Per Sequence Quality Scores
fields.description: FASTQC pass/warn/fail result for per-sequence quality scores.

fields.name: per_base_sequence_content
fields.title: Per Base Sequence Content
fields.description: FASTQC pass/warn/fail result for per-base sequence content.

fields.name: per_sequence_gc_content
fields.title: Per Sequence GC Content
fields.description: FASTQC pass/warn/fail result for per-sequence GC content.

fields.name: per_base_n_content
fields.title: Per Base N Content
fields.description: FASTQC pass/warn/fail result for per-base N content.

fields.name: sequence_length_distribution
fields.title: Sequence Length Distribution
fields.description: FASTQC pass/warn/fail result for sequence length distribution.

fields.name: sequence_duplication_levels
fields.title: Sequence Duplication Levels
fields.description: FASTQC pass/warn/fail result for sequence duplication levels.

fields.name: overrepresented_sequences
fields.title: Overrepresented Sequences
fields.description: FASTQC pass/warn/fail result for overrepresented sequences.

fields.name: adapter_content
fields.title: Adapter Content
fields.description: FASTQC pass/warn/fail result for adapter content.

fields.name: per_tile_sequence_quality
fields.title: Per Tile Sequence Quality
fields.description: FASTQC pass/warn/fail result for per-tile sequence quality. NA if not available.

fields.name: sample
fields.title: Sample
fields.description: Sample identifier from the RUN workflow.

fields.name: group
fields.title: Group
fields.description: Group identifier assigned to this sample in the grouping TSV.
